title: Want L&T to be known as a tech company: SN Subrahmanyan, CEO & MD - Economic Times
content: Want L&T to be known as a tech company: SN Subrahmanyan, CEO & MD  Economic Times
description: "As the IT services business continues to grow faster, the PE multiple and market cap will continue to grow. And that from about 30% of L&T's overall market cap can easily become 45-50%, and ...we will be perceived more as a technology company. We look at ourselves as a technology solutions provider, and we would like to push ourselves further in that space."
